title: Average ticket price Atlanta Hawks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, slightly decreasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, and lastly roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2013/14.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009/10 and 2010/11.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 51.78 was reached at Year 2009/10
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 34.75 was reached at Year 2012/13
